query.statement:
SELECT '0' AS CHECK ,'' AS FLAG , A.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 , A.EBELP AS EBELP -- 순번 , A.POSID AS POSID -- wbs , A.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 , A.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 협력사코드 , A.LNAME AS LNAME -- 협력사명 , A.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 자재내역 , A.CRDAT AS CRDAT -- 청구일 , A.SDATE AS SDATE -- 발주일 , A.MENGE AS MENGE -- 발주수량 , A.CESDBBJD AS CESDBBJD -- 설치실측일 , A.CESDBUPD AS CESDBUPD -- 설치실측 시간 , A.CESDZJDT AS CESDZJDT -- 실측출력 , A.BUDAT AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , A.CESDZIDT AS CESDZIDT -- 입고예정일 , A.SHIPDAT AS SHIPDAT -- 출하일 , A.CESDZMSY AS CESDZMSY -- 미입고 사유 , A.CESDZBGO AS CESDZBGO -- 비고 , A.ZSPEC12 AS ZSPEC12 -- 기종 , A.ZSPEC11 AS ZSPEC11 -- 정지층수 , A.ZQNTY AS ZQNTY -- 현장대수 , A.FLAG1 -- 업데이트구분 , A.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE -- JAMB TYPE , A.SPEC AS SPEC -- 사양 , A.NAMET AS NAMET -- 담당PM , A.PJT AS PJT -- PJT , A.HNO AS HNO -- HNO , A.REP AS REP -- 실측종류 구분 , A.REP_NAME AS REP_NAME , A.CESDZJSD AS CESDZJSD -- JAMB 출하예정일 , A.CESDZJFD AS CESDZJFD -- JAMB 출하완료일 --, A.CESDZTSD AS CESDZTSD -- 토가드 발송일 -- , A.CESDZPSG AS CESDZPSG -- PIT SCREEN 출하여부 -- , A.LAMIX_TG AS LAMIX_TG -- 라믹스 토가드 -- , A.TGLOC AS TG_LOC , A.MPASS AS MPASS --입고수량 , A.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM --품명 , A.JAMB_MATKL AS JAMB_MATKL --JAMB 재질 , VALUE(B.LEAD_TIME,19) AS LEAD_TIME -- JAMB 리드타임 , SAPHEE.GET_WORKINGDAY(SHIPDAT,VALUE(B.LEAD_TIME,19)) AS SHIPDAT2 , VALUE(C.COMP_DAT,'') AS COMP_DAT --제작완료 예정일 , VALUE(C.DOJ_DAT,'') AS DOJ_DAT -- 도장입고일 , VALUE(C.HIG_DAT,'') AS HIG_DAT -- 하이그로시 완료일 , VALUE(C.SHIP_SCH,'') AS SHIP_SCH --출하예정일 , VALUE(C.INST_DAT,'') AS INST_DAT -- 설치요청일 , VALUE(C.BIGO,'') AS BIGO -- 비고 , VALUE(C.DOJ_DAT_CP,'') AS DOJ_DAT_CP -- 도장완료일 , VALUE(C.HIG_DAT_IN,'') AS HIG_DAT_IN -- 하이그로시 입고일 FROM ( SELECT MM.MANDT AS MANDT , MM.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 , MM.EBELP AS EBELP -- 순번 , MM.POSID AS POSID -- wbs , MM.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 , MM.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 협력사코드 , MM.LNAME AS LNAME -- 협력사명 , MM.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 자재내역 , MM.CRDAT AS CRDAT -- 청구일 , MM.SDATE AS SDATE -- 발주일 , MM.MENGE AS MENGE -- 발주수량 , VALUE(MM.CESDBBJD,'') AS CESDBBJD -- 설치실측일 , VALUE(MM.CESDBUPD,'') AS CESDBUPD -- 설치실측 시간 , VALUE(MM.CESDZJDT,'') AS CESDZJDT -- 실측출력 , VALUE(MM.BUDAT,'') AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , VALUE(MM.CESDZIDT,'') AS CESDZIDT -- 입고예정일 , VALUE(MM.SHIPDAT,'') AS SHIPDAT -- 출하일 , VALUE(MM.CESDZMSY,'') AS CESDZMSY -- 미입고 사유 , VALUE(MM.CESDZBGO,'') AS CESDZBGO -- 비고 , MM.ZSPEC12 AS ZSPEC12 -- 기종 , MM.ZSPEC11 AS ZSPEC11 -- 정지층수 , CAST(MA01.ZQNTY AS INT) AS ZQNTY -- 현장대수 , MM.FLAG1 -- 업데이트구분 , MM.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE -- JAMB TYPE , MM.SPEC AS SPEC -- 사양 , MM.NAMET AS NAMET -- 담당PM , SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,6) AS PJT -- PJT , SUBSTR(MM.POSID,7) AS HNO -- HNO , MM.REP AS REP -- 실측종류 구분 , VALUE(MM028.CTEXT2 ,'') AS REP_NAME , VALUE(MM.CESDZJSD,'') AS CESDZJSD -- JAMB 출하예정일 , VALUE(MM.CESDZJFD,'') AS CESDZJFD -- JAMB 출하완료일 , VALUE(MM.CESDZTSD,'') AS CESDZTSD -- 토가드 발송일 , VALUE(MM.CESDZPSG,'') AS CESDZPSG -- PIT SCREEN 출하여부 , CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT= MM.MANDT AND WOKNUM = MM.POSID AND IDNRK IN ('371100308','371100309')) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS LAMIX_TG -- 라믹스 토가드 , CASE WHEN MA01.ZQNTY > '3' THEN '현장 직투입' WHEN LOCATE('SPCC', MM.TXZ01) > 0 OR LOCATE('GI', MM.TXZ01) > 0 THEN '천안 물류' ELSE LNAME END AS TG_LOC , VALUE(SAPHEE.GET_MPASS(MM.MANDT,MM.EBELN,MM.EBELP),0) AS MPASS --입고수량 , MM.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM --품명 , CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361A' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM1M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361B' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM2M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361C' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM3M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361D' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM4M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361E' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM5M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.MATKL,1,5) = 'C361F' THEN (SELECT VALUE FROM SAPHEE.ZSDT0005 WHERE MANDT = '183' AND HOGI = MM.POSID AND CHARACTERISTIC = 'EL_CJM6M' ORDER BY SEQ DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY ) ELSE '' END AS JAMB_MATKL FROM ( SELECT M13.MANDT AS MANDT , M13.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 , M13.EBELP AS EBELP -- 순번 , M13.POSID AS POSID -- wbs , M13.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 , M13.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 협력사코드 , M13.LNAME AS LNAME -- 협력사명 , M13.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 자재내역 , P4.CRDAT AS CRDAT -- 청구일 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.MATKL ORDER BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.CRDAT DESC,P4.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO , M13.SDATE AS SDATE -- 발주일 , M13.MENGE AS MENGE -- 발주수량 , ZSD.CESDDBJD AS CESDBBJD -- 설치실측일 , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDDUPD,9) AS CESDBUPD -- 설치실측 시간 , 'J' AS REP , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDDPDT,1,8) AS CESDZJDT -- 실측출력일 (접수일 필드 이용) , M13.BUDAT AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , ZSDZ.CESDZIDT AS CESDZIDT -- 입고예정일 , M13.SHIPDAT AS SHIPDAT -- 출하일 , ZSDZ.CESDZMSY AS CESDZMSY -- 미입고 사유 , ZSDZ.CESDZBGO AS CESDZBGO -- 비고 , ZM2.ZSPEC12 AS ZSPEC12 -- 기종 , ZM2.ZSPEC11 AS ZSPEC11 -- 정지층수 , M13.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE -- JAMB TYPE , M13.SPEC AS SPEC -- 사양 , CASE WHEN (ZSDZ.EBELN IS NULL AND ZSDZ.EBELP IS NULL) THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS FLAG1 -- 업데이트구분 , ZM2.NAMET AS NAMET -- 담당PM , ZSDZ.CESDZJSD AS CESDZJSD -- JAMB 출하예정일 , ZSDZ.CESDZJFD AS CESDZJFD -- JAMB 출하완료일 , ZSDZ.CESDZTSD AS CESDZTSD -- 토가드 발송일 , ZSDZ.CESDZPSG AS CESDZPSG -- PIT SCREEN 출하여부 , ZSD.CESDDUPD AS UPD , ZSD.CESDDPDT AS PDT , M13.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM , P4.MATKL AS MATKL FROM ( SELECT MM013.MANDT ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT ,MM013.EBELN AS EBELN ,MM013.EBELP AS EBELP ,REPLACE(MM013.POSID, '-P','') AS POSID ,MM013.POST1 AS POST1 ,MM013.MATNR AS MATNR ,MM013.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,MM013.LNAME AS LNAME ,MM013.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,MM011.SPEC AS SPEC ,COALESCE(MM013.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE ,'' AS NCRED ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE , CASE WHEN MM013.EXTWG IS NULL OR MM013.EXTWG = '' OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '' AND MM013.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '24' AND MM013.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN '2' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN '3' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN '4' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN '5' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT , '' AS BUDAT , MM011.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE , MM013.BOX_CK AS BOX_CK , MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM011.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM013.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.MATNR LIKE '361%' AND MM013.STATE = '2' AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# AND MM013.LIFNR IN ('3128538842','1268191379','3038140365')
) AS M13 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDD AS ZSD ON M13.MANDT = ZSD.MANDT AND ZSD.CESDDPJT = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,1,6) AND ZSD.CESDDHNO = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,7)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDZ AS ZSDZ ON M13.MANDT= ZSDZ.MANDT AND M13.EBELN = ZSDZ.EBELN AND M13.EBELP = ZSDZ.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZM2 ON M13.MANDT = ZM2.MANDT AND M13.POSID = ZM2.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS P4 ON M13.MANDT = P4.MANDT AND M13.POSID = P4.WOKNUM AND M13.MATNR = P4.IDNRK
WHERE 1= 1 AND M13.SHIPDAT BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO#
AND M13.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND M13.POSID LIKE #POSID# || '%'
-- JAMB AND M13.JAMB_TYPE > '049'
AND ZM1.ZQNTY = (CASE WHEN '1' < '10' THEN '0' || #ZQNTY# ELSE #ZQNTY# END )
UNION ALL
SELECT M13.MANDT AS MANDT , M13.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 , M13.EBELP AS EBELP -- 순번 , M13.POSID AS POSID -- wbs , M13.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 , M13.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 협력사코드 , M13.LNAME AS LNAME -- 협력사명 , M13.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 자재내역 , P4.CRDAT AS CRDAT -- 청구일 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.MATKL ORDER BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.CRDAT DESC,P4.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO , M13.SDATE AS SDATE -- 발주일 , M13.MENGE AS MENGE -- 발주수량 , ZSD.CESDNBJD AS CESDBBJD -- 설치실측일 , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDNUPD,9) AS CESDBUPD -- 설치실측 시간 , 'N' AS REP , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDNPDT,1,8) AS CESDZJDT -- 실측출력일 (접수일 필드 이용) , M13.BUDAT AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , ZSDZ.CESDZIDT AS CESDZIDT -- 입고예정일 , M13.SHIPDAT AS SHIPDAT -- 출하일 , ZSDZ.CESDZMSY AS CESDZMSY -- 미입고 사유 , ZSDZ.CESDZBGO AS CESDZBGO -- 비고 , ZM2.ZSPEC12 AS ZSPEC12 -- 기종 , ZM2.ZSPEC11 AS ZSPEC11 -- 정지층수 , M13.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE -- JAMB TYPE , M13.SPEC AS SPEC -- 사양 , CASE WHEN (ZSDZ.EBELN IS NULL AND ZSDZ.EBELP IS NULL) THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS FLAG1 -- 업데이트구분 , ZM2.NAMET AS NAMET -- 담당PM , ZSDZ.CESDZJSD AS CESDZJSD -- JAMB 출하예정일 , ZSDZ.CESDZJFD AS CESDZJFD -- JAMB 출하완료일 , ZSDZ.CESDZTSD AS CESDZTSD -- 토가드 발송일 , ZSDZ.CESDZPSG AS CESDZPSG -- PIT SCREEN 출하여부 , ZSD.CESDNUPD AS UPD , ZSD.CESDNPDT AS PDT , M13.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM , P4.MATKL AS MATKL FROM ( SELECT MM013.MANDT ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT ,MM013.EBELN AS EBELN ,MM013.EBELP AS EBELP ,REPLACE(MM013.POSID, '-P','') AS POSID ,MM013.POST1 AS POST1 ,MM013.MATNR AS MATNR ,MM013.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,MM013.LNAME AS LNAME ,MM013.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,MM011.SPEC AS SPEC ,COALESCE(MM013.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE ,'' AS NCRED ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE , CASE WHEN MM013.EXTWG IS NULL OR MM013.EXTWG = '' OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '' AND MM013.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '24' AND MM013.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN '2' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN '3' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN '4' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN '5' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT , '' AS BUDAT , MM011.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE , MM013.BOX_CK AS BOX_CK , MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM011.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM013.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.MATNR LIKE '361%' AND MM013.STATE = '2' AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# AND MM013.LIFNR IN ('3128538842','1268191379','3038140365')
) AS M13 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDN AS ZSD ON M13.MANDT = ZSD.MANDT AND ZSD.CESDNPJT = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,1,6) AND ZSD.CESDNHNO = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,7)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDZ AS ZSDZ ON M13.MANDT= ZSDZ.MANDT AND M13.EBELN = ZSDZ.EBELN AND M13.EBELP = ZSDZ.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZM2 ON M13.MANDT = ZM2.MANDT AND M13.POSID = ZM2.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS P4 ON M13.MANDT = P4.MANDT AND M13.POSID = P4.WOKNUM AND M13.MATNR = P4.IDNRK
WHERE 1= 1 AND M13.SHIPDAT BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO#
AND M13.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND M13.POSID LIKE #POSID# || '%'
-- JAMB AND M13.JAMB_TYPE > '049'
AND ZM1.ZQNTY = (CASE WHEN '1' < '10' THEN '0' || #ZQNTY# ELSE #ZQNTY# END )
UNION ALL
SELECT M13.MANDT AS MANDT , M13.EBELN AS EBELN -- 발주번호 , M13.EBELP AS EBELP -- 순번 , M13.POSID AS POSID -- wbs , M13.POST1 AS POST1 -- 현장명 , M13.LIFNR AS LIFNR -- 협력사코드 , M13.LNAME AS LNAME -- 협력사명 , M13.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 -- 자재내역 , P4.CRDAT AS CRDAT -- 청구일 , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.MATKL ORDER BY P4.MANDT,P4.WOKNUM,P4.MATNR,P4.IDNRK,P4.ITEM_SEQ,P4.CRDAT DESC,P4.SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO , M13.SDATE AS SDATE -- 발주일 , M13.MENGE AS MENGE -- 발주수량 , ZSD.CESDFBJD AS CESDBBJD -- 설치실측일 , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDFUPD,9) AS CESDBUPD -- 설치실측 시간 , 'S' AS REP , SUBSTR(ZSD.CESDFPDT,1,8) AS CESDZJDT -- 실측출력일 (접수일 필드 이용) , M13.BUDAT AS BUDAT -- 입고일 , ZSDZ.CESDZIDT AS CESDZIDT -- 입고예정일 , M13.SHIPDAT AS SHIPDAT -- 출하일 , ZSDZ.CESDZMSY AS CESDZMSY -- 미입고 사유 , ZSDZ.CESDZBGO AS CESDZBGO -- 비고 , ZM2.ZSPEC12 AS ZSPEC12 -- 기종 , ZM2.ZSPEC11 AS ZSPEC11 -- 정지층수 , M13.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE -- JAMB TYPE , M13.SPEC AS SPEC -- 사양 , CASE WHEN (ZSDZ.EBELN IS NULL AND ZSDZ.EBELP IS NULL) THEN 'I' ELSE 'U' END AS FLAG1 -- 업데이트구분 , ZM2.NAMET AS NAMET -- 담당PM , ZSDZ.CESDZJSD AS CESDZJSD -- JAMB 출하예정일 , ZSDZ.CESDZJFD AS CESDZJFD -- JAMB 출하완료일 , ZSDZ.CESDZTSD AS CESDZTSD -- 토가드 발송일 , ZSDZ.CESDZPSG AS CESDZPSG -- PIT SCREEN 출하여부 , ZSD.CESDFUPD AS UPD , ZSD.CESDFPDT AS PDT , M13.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM , P4.MATKL AS MATKL FROM ( SELECT MM013.MANDT ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.EINDT) AS EINDT ,MM013.EBELN AS EBELN ,MM013.EBELP AS EBELP ,REPLACE(MM013.POSID, '-P','') AS POSID ,MM013.POST1 AS POST1 ,MM013.MATNR AS MATNR ,MM013.LIFNR AS LIFNR ,MM013.LNAME AS LNAME ,MM013.TXZ01 AS TXZ01 ,MM011.SPEC AS SPEC ,COALESCE(MM013.MENGE, 0) AS MENGE ,'' AS NCRED ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.UDATE) AS UDATE ,SAPHEE.GET_ZERODATE(MM013.SDATE) AS SDATE , CASE WHEN MM013.EXTWG IS NULL OR MM013.EXTWG = '' OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '' AND MM013.EXTWG = 'BOX33') OR (MM013.BOX_CK = '24' AND MM013.EXTWG='BOX24') THEN (CASE WHEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 IS NULL THEN '00000000' WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO = '' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'A%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'B%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'C%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'D%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN MM011.BLOCK_NO LIKE 'E%' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) ELSE (CASE ( CASE WHEN MM013.BOX_CK = '24' THEN (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026_1 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) ELSE (SELECT VALUE(SUBSTR(BLOCK,1,1),'') FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT026 WHERE MANDT= MM013.MANDT AND BOXNO = MM013.EXTWG) END ) WHEN '1' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT1 WHEN '2' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT2 WHEN '3' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT3 WHEN '4' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT4 WHEN '5' THEN MM025.SHIPDAT5 ELSE '00000000' END) END AS SHIPDAT , '' AS BUDAT , MM011.JAMB_TYPE AS JAMB_TYPE , MM013.BOX_CK AS BOX_CK , MM013.EXTWG AS EXTWG , MM011.MATNR_NM AS MATNR_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT013 AS MM013 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ON MM013.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND MM013.MATNR = MM011.MATNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT025 AS MM025 ON MM013.MANDT = MM025.MANDT AND SUBSTR(MM013.POSID,1,9) = MM025.POSID AND MM025.PSTYPE = '02' WHERE MM013.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND MM013.MATNR LIKE '361%' AND MM013.STATE = '2' AND MM013.UDATE BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# AND MM013.LIFNR IN ('3128538842','1268191379','3038140365')
) AS M13 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDF AS ZSD ON M13.MANDT = ZSD.MANDT AND ZSD.CESDFPJT = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,1,6) AND ZSD.CESDFHNO = SUBSTR(M13.POSID,7)
LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZTBESDZ AS ZSDZ ON M13.MANDT= ZSDZ.MANDT AND M13.EBELN = ZSDZ.EBELN AND M13.EBELP = ZSDZ.EBELP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS ZM2 ON M13.MANDT = ZM2.MANDT AND M13.POSID = ZM2.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPPT004 AS P4 ON M13.MANDT = P4.MANDT AND M13.POSID = P4.WOKNUM AND M13.MATNR = P4.IDNRK
WHERE 1= 1 AND M13.SHIPDAT BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO# AND M13.MATNR LIKE '361%'
AND M13.LIFNR = #LIFNR#
AND M13.POSID LIKE #POSID# || '%'
-- JAMB AND M13.JAMB_TYPE > '049'
AND ZM1.ZQNTY = (CASE WHEN '1' < '10' THEN '0' || #ZQNTY# ELSE #ZQNTY# END )
) AS MM LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZLCODE AS MM028 ON MM028.MANDT=MM.MANDT AND MM028.CODE1='PS101' AND MM028.LANG = #G_LANG# AND MM028.CODE2=MM.REP LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS MA01 ON MA01.MANDT= MM.MANDT AND MA01.POSID = (CASE WHEN SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,2) = 'QM' THEN SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,8) WHEN SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,1) = 'Q' THEN SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,7) ELSE SUBSTR(MM.POSID,1,6) END) WHERE ROWNO = 1
AND MM.CESDBBJD BETWEEN #DATE_FM# AND #DATE_TO#
ORDER BY MM.LIFNR,MM.POSID ) AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT991 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.JAMB_TYPE = B.JAMB_TYPE AND A.JAMB_MATKL = B.JAMB_SPEC LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMMT992 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.EBELN = C.EBELN AND A.EBELP = C.EBELP AND A.REP = C.REP
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
